item.title: UK House Prices Post First Annual Drop Since 2012, Halifax Says
item.description: UK House Prices Fall for First Time in a Decade House prices in the UK fell by 0.3% in May, marking the first annual drop since 2012. The fall in house prices was driven by a slowdown in the market, as buyers became more cautious in the face of rising interest rates and the cost of living crisis.
